text: Edward Russell Mills (February 23, 1922 – September 27, 2002) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Oshkosh All-Stars and averaged 2.9 points per game. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2002 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Wisconsin Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Oshkosh All-Stars players Category:Sportspeople from Milwaukee Category:Wisconsin Badgers men's basketball players
title: Ed Mills
